short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: preview the color code of the text on web site by changing the background color. Currently, only the hex format is supported.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can preview the color of the color code as it appears as text on the website. Just like you can preview the actual color of a color code in VSCode.

When you press the extension's button, the background color will change to the color of the color code in the text.

Notes
- Currently, only hex format is supported.
- The function may not work on some websites. In that case, please understand.
